Package org.apache.edgent.runtime.jsoncontrol

Control service that takes a Json message and invokes an operation on a control service MBean.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonControlService
    Control service that accepts control instructions as JSON objects.

Package org.apache.edgent.runtime.jsoncontrol Description

Control service that takes a Json message and invokes an operation on a control service MBean.

Operations

A JSON object passed to controlRequest with these name/value pairs is handled as an operation resulting in a method call to a void method on a control service MBean interface.
  • type=type - MBean type.
  • alias=alias - Alias of the MBean.
  • op=name - Name of the operation to invoke, this is the method name on the MBean.
  • arguments=optional list of arguments - Arguments passed to the operation (method).
The MBean must be uniquely identified through its type and alias and previously registered using registerControl().
